title: HeadlessChat UI Improvements
description: Enhance the HeadlessChat UI to be more polished and feature-rich with keyboard shortcuts, session persistence, TodoWrite panel, and improved tool renderers

requirements.item: Tab key toggles extended thinking mode on/off
Shift+Tab cycles through modes: normal → acceptEdits → plan
Session persistence - load previous messages when reopening session
TodoWrite tool renders as sticky bottom panel with checkable items
Read tool has collapsible header with Expand button
Edit tool shows inline diff with red/green highlighting
Bash tool shows command, output, and exit code badge
Mode indicator displays in header (thinking, acceptEdits, plan)
Visual polish: cards, shadows, badges, spinners
Thinking blocks render as collapsible gray italic text
Token count display (X in, Y out)

e2eTests.name: TodoWrite panel
steps: Verify sticky panel appears at bottom
Verify items show with checkboxes and priority badges

e2eTests.name: Tool renderers
steps: Trigger Read tool - verify collapsible with Expand button
Trigger Edit tool - verify inline diff with red/green
Trigger Bash tool - verify command, output, exit badge
Trigger Glob tool - verify file count badge
Trigger Grep tool - verify match highlighting

e2eTests.name: Visual polish
steps: Verify cards have rounded corners and shadows

acceptanceCriteria.item: All keyboard shortcuts work (Tab, Shift+Tab, Ctrl+T)
Session messages persist and reload correctly
TodoWrite panel is sticky at bottom with toggle
UI looks polished with cards, badges, shadows
